Bash("C:\\Program Files\\PostgreSQL\\17\\bin\\psql.exe" -U postgres -d ongozacyberhub -c "INSERT INTO roles \(name, display_name, description, is_system_role, created_at, updated_at\) VALUES \(''finance'', ''Finance'', ''Finance team'', true, NOW\(\), NOW\(\)\) ON CONFLICT \(name\) DO NOTHING; SELECT id, name FROM roles WHERE name = ''finance'';")
